name: To The Divide: A Visual Novel
name_original: To The Divide: A Visual Novel
description:
Bienvenue Friends!

This is the culmination of our final year at university. It's a little rough but the two of us have worked towards this little visual novel game for the best part of a few months. Feel free to play this and give a little love to our social media pages so that we may be able to continue production and perhaps if there's enough engagement we can Kickstarter this project further to hopefully create the full game we planned on in the first place.

Find us on Twitter:

@lydsarts  @Cowna247

To The Divide Discord Server:

https://discord.gg/Scckhw26QP

Thank You! 

Instructions for Download:

1. Download the correct file depending on if you use a Windows (WIN) or Apple (MAC) product.

2. Unzip the folder with 7Zip or WinRar. 

3. After the file has unzipped, click on GradProject-1.0.

4. Click on GradProject.exe. This will run the game in the engine RenPy.

For those who aren't accustomed to visual novels:

To play the game, click Start. 

To progress forward, click [SPACE].
